name: Add or update contacts in SendGrid from Webflow site submissions
description: Effortlessly manage your website contacts with this template! Every time a new site is created in Webflow, Make will automatically add or update the corresponding contact in SendGrid. This seamless integration ensures that your email marketing lists are always up-to-date, allowing you to engage with your audience effectively and enhance your communication strategy. Perfect for businesses looking to streamline their contact management process!
